thread.title: Art, architecture and wine in South Africa’s Cape Town (VIDEO)
thread.title_full: Art, architecture and wine in South Africa’s Cape Town (VIDEO)

title: Art, architecture and wine in South Africa’s Cape Town (VIDEO)
text:
Art, architecture and wine in South Africa’s Cape Town (VIDEO) Thursday October 22, 2015 Print Article 
CAPE TOWN, Oct 22 — Cape Town is a singularly inviting place, wowing visitors with its art, architecture, wine and culinary offerings, not to mention its spectacular setting amid mountains and sea. — The New York Times 
Cape Town's Table Mountain, seen in this screenshot taken from the New York Times' video, is a popular tourist attraction.
